DOC.brief_summary: The purpose present study compare alveolar bone change marker gingival health around new Lanes® dental implant rehabilitate use new switch platform abutment ( SPR ) traditional ( CPK ) abutment .
DOC.brief_title: Soft Hard Tissue Changes Around New Lance® Implants Using Traditional Switch Platform Abutments
DOC.criteria: 1 . Adult patient age 18 80 yr . 2 . Implants treatment plan single crown rehabilitation . 3 . Submerged implant placement . 4 . Patients willing participate twelve month study . 5 . Up 2 implant per patient allow . 1 . Active periodontal disease . 2 . Systemic condition medication may affect soft hard tissue heal . 3 . Pregnancy intention become pregnant next twelve month . 4 . Parafunctional occlusal scheme habit .
